title: Wellsville Police Blotter
content: Date: Tuesday September 1, 2015 Wellsville Police arrested Amanda N. L. Allman, age 28 of Wellsville, and Joseph U. Lewis III, age 31 of Rochester, following a traffic stop on West Dyke Street in the village.  Allman was charged with Unlawful Possession of Marijuana, and Lewis was Charged with Aggravated Unlicensed Operation 2nd, Unregistered Motor Vehicle and Unlawful Possession of Marijuana.  Allman and Lewis were processed, issued appearance tickets and released.  Allman and Lewis are both due to appear in Wellsville Village Court on September 8th at 4:30 pm.
